title: Private Dining Rooms In Colombo
abstract: Here's where to go if you're looking to host a private dinner in Colombo.
content:
Where can you host a private dinner in Colombo? We've been getting a lot of calls about this so we thought we'd make a list.
This is not a comprehensive list. If we've missed anything, please let us know. We also didn't include all the
restaurants, you can assume that most of them have private rooms for up to 10 people.
